attributes.action: put the tax increase on fuel in line with the VAT reduction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let's not have give with one hand take away with the other let's have a budget aimed at recession not profit for a change. Let's see other more viable entities taking a hit. Spending on essentials is one thing, we all do it at home, let's see the government eradicate non-essential spending before penalising us to pay for frivolity. Remove the 2p increase at the same time the VAT increases.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
